headline: GTA Online
subtitle: New Adversary Modes
content:
Put Lowriders into the thick of the action with 3 new Adversary modes:
Relay - One racer drives while the other waits ready on the starting line. With each lap, the roles are reversed.

Offense Defense - A Runner collecting checkpoints in a lowrider must work together with their Blocker, who protects the Runner and takes out opponents for them.

Keep The Pace - Stay above a minimum speed while racing around courses littered with jumps and obstacles. If you slow down too much, youâ€™ll explode.
